name: Treasure Checklist
description: Do you have the icon you wanted?

group-by-chest.name: Group Tier II Chests
group-by-chest.description: <cg>Tier II</c> rewards are grouped by chest instead of being displayed separately

disable-checkmark.name: Remove Checkmark
disable-checkmark.description: Icons aren't greyed out and displayed without checkmark. If you want to see the designs

garage-button.name: Garage Button
garage-button.description: If you want the mod's button in the Icon kit

display-gold-chests.name: Gold Key Chests
display-gold-chests.description: Adds a 7th page for <cy>Golden Key</c> chests. Currently there's <cr>no way to obtain those keys</c>. This only serves to see what Icons you can get
